# Explore
Plot age distribution D36 vs others D

```{r simpleplot, echo=FALSE}
df %>%
    filter(result == 'D') %>%
    mutate(D_group =
           ifelse(result_description == 'D36', 'D36', 'Oth-D')) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = age, color = D_group)) + 
    geom_density() +
    ggtitle("D36 vs Other-D Age Distribution")
```
